EntryName	ZNT4_HUMAN

GeneName	SLC30A4 ZNT4
Length	429
Function	Probable proton-coupled zinc ion antiporter mediating zinc import from cytoplasm potentially into the endocytic compartment (PubMed:19521526). Controls zinc deposition in milk (By similarity).
Subcellular Location	Endosome membrane; Late endosome membrane; Lysosome membrane
